skills.name: Blood Rage
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 15s] Creates a blood tornado that sweeps away enemies, dealing 9x35% ATK of Physical DMG and sending them into a Blood Rage, doubling their Attack Speed but making them take 60% more Elemental DMG. The Blood Rage lasts for 9.00s.

skills.name: Blood Revival
skills.description: Combo Hit Count exceeds 15, gain 30% Physical DMG. When undeployed, heal 30.0 HP every 0.5s if HP is below 50%.
